profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Twilio | Remote Developer with a passion for Container Orchestration and Automated GUI Design Tools
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with over 9 years of experience in software development, focusing on container orchestration and automated GUI design tools. Proficient in Go, Java, and Kubernetes.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Twilio
description: Designed and implemented container orchestration systems using Kubernetes (Lang: Go)
Developed automated GUI design tools for Android applications using droiddraw (Lang: Java)

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Maintained and updated open-source projects on GitHub
Collaborated with clients to deliver custom software solutions

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of various open-source projects on GitHub
Ensured code quality and adherence to best practices

experience.title: Go Developer
description: Developed and deployed Go-based applications using Kubernetes
Improved performance and scalability of existing systems
